ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon olive oil, or more if needed

cookingTips: Coat popcorn kernels evenly with oil before microwaving for better salt adhesion
Cover bowl loosely to trap steam while allowing moisture to escape
Microwave at 50% power in 3-minute intervals to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Looking for ways to enhance popcorn flavor or achieve better popping results?
